item.title: express.js and ejs - reuse template on server and client
item.description: ejs has a client-side support but documentation and examples do not describe how to reuse the same template on the server and on the client side. For now I found two ways to do it. First way is to send a request from the client, get a template from a file and render it. And the second - put a template into the page when render it on the server and then just use the template on the client.
